import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { Outlet } from "react-router"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import { NavBar } from "../components/navbar/nav"; import "./Profile.styles.css"; import { FiBookmark, FiHeart, FiGrid } from "react-icons/fi"; import { getUserPosts } from "../../../features/post/PostAPI"; export function ProfileByUserName({ userProfileData , userProfileID}) { const { userID, token } = useSelector((state) => state.users); const { userPosts } = useSelector((state) => state.posts) ; const { followers, following, firstName, lastName, username, bio, website, avatar, } = userProfileData; const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(getUserPosts({ userID: userProfileID, token })); }, [userProfileID, token]); return (
{username} { userProfileID === userID ? ( ) : ( )}
{totalPosts} posts
{followers.length} followers
{following.length} following
{firstName} {lastName}
{website}
{bio}
    {" "} Posts {userProfileID === userID && ( <> ({" "} {" "} Bookmark
    Likes
    ) )}
); }
